1.name: Acid Attack
1.description: Deal 1 extra damage each turn (even when you don't otherwise attack).

6.name: Background Dweller
6.description: You can always reroll any [3] you have.

7.name: Burrowing
7.description: Deal 1 extra damage on Tokyo. Deal 1 damage when yielding Tokyo to the monster taking it.

8.name: Camouflage
8.description: If you take damage roll a die for each damage point. On a [Heart] you do not take that damage point.

10.name: Complete Destruction
10.description: If you roll [1][2][3][Heart][Attack][Snot] gain 9[Star] in addition to the regular results.

12.name: Dedicated News Team
12.description: Gain 1[Star] whenever you buy a card.

13.name: Drop from High Altitude
13.description: + 2[Star] and take control of Tokyo if you don't already control it.

14.name: Eater of the Dead
14.description: Gain 3[Star] every time a monster's [Heart] goes to 0.

16.name: Energy Hoarder
16.description: You gain 1[Star] for every 6[Snot] you have at the end of your turn.

19.name: Even Bigger
19.description: Your maximum [Heart] is increased by 2. Gain 2[Heart] when you get this card.

22.name: Fire Blast
22.description: Deal 2 damage to all other monsters.

23.name: Fire Breathing
23.description: Your neighbors take 1 extra damage when you deal damage

24.name: Freeze Time
24.description: On a turn where you score [1][1][1], you can take another turn with one less die.

25.name: Frenzy
25.description: When you purchase this card Take another turn immediately after this one.

26.name: Friend of Children
26.description: When you gain any [Snot] gain 1 extra [Snot].

27.name: Gas Refinery
27.description: + 2[Star] and deal 3 damage to all other monsters.

28.name: Giant Brain
28.description: You have one extra reroll each turn.

31.name: Healing Ray
31.description: You can heal other monsters with your [Heart] results. They must pay you 2[Snot] for each damage you heal (or their remaining [Snot] if they haven't got enough.

32.name: Herbivore
32.description: Gain 1[Star] on your turn if you don't damage anyone.

33.name: Herd Culler
33.description: You can change one of your dice to a [1] each turn.

35.name: It Has a Child
35.description: If you are eliminated discard all your cards and lose all your [Star], Heal to 10[Heart] and start again.

37.name: Jets
37.description: You suffer no damage when yielding Tokyo.

38.name: Made in a Lab
38.description: When purchasing cards you can peek at and purchase the top card of the deck.

39.name: Metamorph
39.description: At the end of your turn you can discard any keep cards you have to receive the [Snot] they were purchased for.

40.name: Mimic
40.description: Choose a card any monster has in play and put a mimic counter on it. This card counts as a duplicate of that card as if it just had been bought. Spend 1[Snot] at the start of your turn to change the power you are mimicking.

41.name: Monster Batteries
41.description: When you purchase this put as many [Snot] as you want on it from your reserve. Match this from the bank. At the start of each turn take 2[Snot] off and add them to your reserve. When there are no [Snot] left discard this card.

43.name: Nova Breath
43.description: Your attacks damage all other monsters.

45.name: Omnivore
45.description: Once each turn you can score [1][2][3] for 2[Star]. You can use these dice in other combinations.

46.name: Opportunist
46.description: Whenever a new card is revealed you have the option of purchasing it as soon as it is revealed.

47.name: Parasitic Tentacles
47.description: You can purchase cards from other monsters. Pay them the [Snot] cost.

48.name: Plot Twist
48.description: Change one die to any result. Discard when used.

49.name: Poison Quills
49.description: When you score [2][2][2] also deal 2 damage.

50.name: Poison Spit
50.description: When you deal damage to monsters give them a poison counter. Monsters take 1 damage for each poison counter they have at the end of their turn. You can get rid of a poison counter with a [Heart] (that [Heart] doesn't heal a damage also).

51.name: Psychic Probe
51.description: You can reroll a die of each other monster once each turn. If the reroll is [Heart] discard this card.

52.name: Rapid Healing
52.description: Spend 2[Snot] at any time to heal 1 damage.

53.name: Regeneration
53.description: When you heal, heal 1 extra damage.

54.name: Rooting for the Underdog
54.description: At the end of a turn when you have the fewest [Star] gain 1 [Star].

55.name: Shrink Ray
55.description: When you deal damage to monsters give them a shrink counter. A monster rolls one less die for each shrink counter. You can get rid of a shrink counter with a [Heart] (that [Heart] doesn't heal a damage also).

57.name: Smoke Cloud
57.description: This card starts with 3 charges. Spend a charge for an extra reroll. Discard this card when all charges are spent.

58.name: Solar Powered
58.description: At the end of your turn gain 1[Snot] if you have no [Snot].

59.name: Spiked Tail
59.description: When you attack deal 1 extra damage.

60.name: Stretchy
60.description: You can spend 2[Snot] to change one of your dice to any result.

63.name: Urbavore
63.description: Gain 1 extra [Star] when beginning the turn in Tokyo. Deal 1 extra damage when dealing any damage from Tokyo.

64.name: Vast Storm
64.description: + 2[Star]. All other monsters lose 1[Snot] for every 2[Snot] they have.

65.name: We're Only Making It Stronger
65.description: When you lose 2[Heart] or more gain 1[Snot].

66.name: Wings
66.description: Spend 2[Snot] to negate damage to you for a turn.

68.name: Army
68.description: (+ 1[Star] and suffer one damage) for each card you have.

70.name: Intimidating Roar
70.description: The monsters in Tokyo must yield if you damage them.

71.name: Monster Sidekick
71.description: If someone kills you, Go back to 10[Heart] and lose all your [Star]. If either of you or your killer win, or all other players are eliminated then you both win. If your killer is eliminated then you are also. If you are eliminated a second time this card has no effect.

72.name: Reflective Hide
72.description: If you suffer damage the monster that inflicted the damage suffers 1 as well.

74.name: Super Jump
74.description: Once each turn you may spend 1[Snot] to negate 1 damage you are receiving.

75.name: Throw a Tanker
75.description: On a turn you deal 3 or more damage gain 2[Star].

76.name: Thunder Stomp
76.description: If you score 4[Star] in a turn, all players roll one less die until your next turn.

77.name: Unstable DNA
77.description: If you yield Tokyo you can take any card the recipient has and give him this card.
